problem_statement:
Reorganize appendices:
Here is the current order:

1. [Contributors](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/01-contributors.html)
2. [Licenses](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/02-licenses.html)
3. [Hierarchical Event Descriptors](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/03-hed.html)
4. [Entity table](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/04-entity-table.html)
5. [Units](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/05-units.html)
6. [MEG file formats](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/06-meg-file-formats.html)
7. [MEG systems](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/07-meg-systems.html)
8. [Coordinate systems](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/08-coordinate-systems.html)
9. [Entities](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/09-entities.html)
10. [File collections](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/10-file-collections.html)
11. [Quantitative MRI](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/11-qmri.html)
12. [Arterial Spin Labeling](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/12-arterial-spin-labeling.html)
13. [Cross modality correspondence](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/13-cross-modality-correspondence.html)
14. [Glossary](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/14-glossary.html)

I think we should reorganize it so that it moves from more general topics to more specific. For example, the glossary should be close to the top, along with general specification principles like entity descriptions and units.

1. [Contributors](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/01-contributors.html)
2. [Licenses](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/02-licenses.html) 
14. [Glossary](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/14-glossary.html)
5. [Entity table](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/04-entity-table.html)
9. [Entities](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/09-entities.html)
6. [Units](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/05-units.html)
10. [File collections](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/10-file-collections.html)
4. [Hierarchical Event Descriptors](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/03-hed.html)
7. [MEG file formats](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/06-meg-file-formats.html)
8. [MEG systems](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/07-meg-systems.html)
9. [Coordinate systems](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/08-coordinate-systems.html)
11. [Quantitative MRI](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/11-qmri.html)
12. [Arterial Spin Labeling](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/12-arterial-spin-labeling.html)
13. [Cross modality correspondence](https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/latest/99-appendices/13-cross-modality-correspondence.html)
